Class OthelloGame

java.lang.Object
othello.gamelogic.OthelloGame
public class OthelloGame extends Object
Models a board of Othello. Includes methods to get available moves and take spaces.

    • getAvailableMoves

      public Map<BoardSpace, List<BoardSpace>> getAvailableMoves(Player player)
      Returns the available moves for a player. Used by the GUI to get available moves each turn.
      Parameters:
      player - player to get moves for
      Returns:
      the map of available moves,that maps destination to list of origins

    • initBoard

      public void initBoard()
      Initializes the board at the start of the game with all EMPTY spaces.

    • takeSpace

      public void takeSpace(Player actingPlayer, Player opponent, int x, int y)
      PART 1 TODO: Implement this method Claims the specified space for the acting player. Should also check if the space being taken is already owned by the acting player, should not claim anything if acting player already owns space at (x,y)
      Parameters:
      actingPlayer - the player that will claim the space at (x,y)
      opponent - the opposing player, will lose a space if their space is at (x,y)
      x - the x-coordinate of the space to claim
      y - the y-coordinate of the space to claim

    • takeSpaces

      public void takeSpaces(Player actingPlayer, Player opponent, Map<BoardSpace, List<BoardSpace>> availableMoves, BoardSpace selectedDestination)
      PART 1 TODO: Implement this method Claims spaces from all origins that lead to a specified destination. This is called when a player, human or computer, selects a valid destination.
      Parameters:
      actingPlayer - the player that will claim spaces
      opponent - the opposing player, that may lose spaces
      availableMoves - map of the available moves, that maps destination to list of origins
      selectedDestination - the specific destination that a HUMAN player selected

    • computerDecision

      public BoardSpace computerDecision(ComputerPlayer computer)
      PART 2 TODO: Implement this method Gets the computer decision for its turn. Should call a method within the ComputerPlayer class that returns a BoardSpace using a specific strategy.
      Parameters:
      computer - computer player that is deciding their move for their turn
      Returns:
      the BoardSpace that was decided upon
